headers.value: default-src 'self' https://*.dexscreener.com https://dexscreener.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://api.dexscreener.com https://*.dexscreener.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.dexscreener.com https://dexscreener.com
